Sefton crash: Two dead, five injured, emergency services rush to scene of major crash near Christchurch https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/sefton-crash-multiple-people-injured-emergency-services-rush-to-scene/CVV46KYFRRBQ5NSSDTASZZQZUY/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/sefton-crash-multiple-people-injured-emergency-services-rush-to-scene/CVV46KYFRRBQ5NSSDTASZZQZUY/ Pierre NixonEmergency services responded to the pile-up on Main North Rd / SH1, near Sefton. Auckland teens arrested for fleeing police, crashing into car, driving on wrong side of road https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/auckland-teens-arrested-for-fleeing-police-crashing-into-car-driven-on-wrong-side-of-road/6PVE4CJDQRAYPPC3ATEKGRZYBY/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/auckland-teens-arrested-for-fleeing-police-crashing-into-car-driven-on-wrong-side-of-road/6PVE4CJDQRAYPPC3ATEKGRZYBY/ The two teenagers were allegedly in a stolen car, fled 18km from Newmarket to Whenuapai. Sun, 07 Jan 2024 23:46:10 +0000 The police Eagle helicopter tracked the car driving onto the Northwestern Motorway from Lincoln Rd, Henderson, where it drove on the wrong side.
Hospital safety: 12-year-old’s near miss after radiology report showing liver bleed went missing https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/hospital-safety-12-year-olds-near-miss-after-radiology-report-showing-liver-bleed-went-missing/6GKD6MGRJ5DL3FYAKG4TQEELZQ/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/hospital-safety-12-year-olds-near-miss-after-radiology-report-showing-liver-bleed-went-missing/6GKD6MGRJ5DL3FYAKG4TQEELZQ/ Alex SpenceRadiologist Dr Bryan Wolf alleged that the child could have died.Sun, 07 Jan 2024 16:00:00 +0000 Dr Bryan Wolf, a consultant radiologist in Hawke's Bay, who has been pushing Te Whatu Ora - Health New Zealand to be more open about safety risks arising from defective information systems.

ELE group collapse: Workers forced to sleep in cars, owner pleads for payment https://www.nzherald.co.nz/business/ele-group-collapse-workers-forced-to-sleep-in-cars-owner-pleads-for- payment/YUCB2UKAUFGPZIJEAZKBSX2W6A/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/business/ele-group-collapse-workers-forced-to-sleep-in-cars-owner-pleads-for- payment/YUCB2UKAUFGPZIJEAZKBSX2W6A/ Anne Gibson'I urge you to consider the consequences of withholding payment': ELE owner to clients Sun, 07 Jan 2024 21:48:20 +0000 Up to 24 ex-ELE Group workers have been forced to sleep in their cars, unable to afford rent or power and struggling to survive here.
